name: To Wander
description:
To Wander is a short, spooky visual novel game set in a strange library.

This game was originally made as a school project, but I really enjoyed making it and plan to update it with actual art, better writing, and possibly original music. Right now the art is really bad because I had to do it myself, but in a future update I'll be able to have someone else do it. Hope you have fun playing!
